com.camerontec.catalys.core.message

Interface ISendingTransformer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFromMessageTransformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastSendingTransformer, FixSendingTransformer

    public interface ISendingTransformer
extends IFromMessageTransformer
    Transformer for converting IFIXMessage's into a form suitable for sending over the wire. This extension to IFromMessageTransformer adds the ability to set parameters for FIX encryption and strict mode.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setStrictMode

        void setStrictMode(boolean value)
        Can be used to relax Catalys's strict enforcement of the FIX protocol.

        WARNING: Normally you should never call this.

        This method is included for testing purposes and, in particular, for the use of FIX certification applications. Such applications have the unusual requirement of needing to artificially generate protocol error conditions in order to test whether the FIX engine being tested handles those errors correctly.

        Sessions automatically start and run in strict mode. Use this call only if you do not want to operate in strict mode.

        While not running in strict mode, the checksum field which is normally populated by Catalys will be set only if it does not already exist in the message being sent. This allows the application to set a non standard value in this field.

        WARNING AGAIN: Don't be surprised if the protocol doesn't work as expected if you are not running in strict mode!

        Parameters:
        value - False if you want to relax strict FIX protocol enforcement.

      • setBeginString

        void setBeginString(String beginString)
        Set the beginString for this sending transformer.
        Parameters:
        beginString - the beginString to set
